alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:39AM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Paducah, Smithland Dam, Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .Recent heavy rainfall will continue to cause rises on the Ohio River through the weekend into early next week. For the Ohio River...including Smithland Dam, Paducah, Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Smithland Dam. * WHEN...From late Thursday night until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 36.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early Friday morning to 42.5 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
